text: 2. And envy is from Satan: the evil usage of the evil calf is from the Egyptians.[fn-36-P3680_1166678:32-nf] The hateful sight of the hateful image of four faces is from the Hittites.[fn-36-P3681_1166856:33-nf] Accursed disputation, that hidden moth, is from the Greeks.
title: The Pearl-Seven Hymns on the Faith
author: Ephraim Syrus
